name: Omurice
recipeInstructions: 1. Cut the chicken into 1/2 inch pieces.
2. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
3. Rub the seasonings into the chicken meat.
4. Finely dice the onion,
5. Slice the mushroom.
6. Very finely dice the garlic.
7. Finely slice the stock cube.
8. Pour hot water over the frozen peas, drain, then season with salt.
9. Crack the eggs into a bowl, mix well, and add the cream. Season with salt and pepper.
10. Put a large frying pan on a low heat. Add a little olive oil.
11. Add the garlic.
12. When softened, increase the heat to medium and add the onion.
13. When translucent, add the chicken.
14. When the chicken begins to brown add the button mushrooms.
15. Add the wine and cook out the alcohol.
16. Add the canned tomato, ketchup, shave stock cube, and a bay leaf.
17. Reduce the sauce slightly, then add the peas.
18. When the sauce is thick and begins to sizzle, remove the bay leaf, taste, and adjust the seasoning.
19. Add the rice and combine.
20. Divide into two bowls.
21. Make an omelette with two eggs. When the omelette is done, lay the filling in a thick stip across the centre. Bring the sides of the omelette up around the mixture.
22. Turn out onto a plate, and shape with a paper towel.
23. Drizzle tomato ketchup over in a zig zag style.
